attributes.action: Allow trans women to legally identify as women in the Equality Act.
attributes.additional_details: Trans women are no threat to women. This act also puts trans women at risk. If a trans woman who very much passes as a woman enters a male bathroom, she will be put in danger. Also if a male passing trans man enters the womens bathroom, not only will children be scared, they will receive bad looks and fear from adult women as well.
attributes.background: Allow trans women to be protected as legal women under the Equality Act. They should be allowed to use womens spaces.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Amend Equality Act to define the terms woman and man not based on biological sex
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725223
